content:
Apologies, that was a mistake. The previous response was not relevant to the topic of Women's Month. Here's a revised post:

Fun fact: Did you know that women are more likely to travel solo than men? This Women's Month, let's celebrate the spirit of adventure and encourage more women to explore the world. Whether it's a solo trip or a group adventure with your furry friend, PetFriendly has got your back with thousands of listings for pet-friendly accommodations. So pack your bags, grab your dog, and let's hit the road! #WomensMonth #SoloTravel #PetFriendly
